posts.title: hahah
posts.text: This is the standard postEvery change logged here.1. 文章目录若要展示文章目录，请在主题配置中添加如下挂件配置： 12345678_config.icarus.ymlwidgets: - type: toc position: left # 是否显示目录项目的序号 index: true 然后，在需要开启目录的文章头部加入toc: true： 123456Post.mdtitle: 一篇有目录的文章toc: true---文章内容... Google AdSense在Google AdSense上新建广告。 然后，复制广告HTML代码中的data-ad-client和data-ad-slot值分别填入到挂件配置的client_id和slot_id项中。 示例如下： 12345678_config.icarus.ymlwidgets: - position: left type: adsense client_id: ca-pub-xxxxxxxx slot_id: xxxxxxx hahaha this is a test… ==high light== H1H2H3H4H5H6####### no H7 no more dedeaa wow ded big hole italy 12345678910111213141516<script src="https://giscus.app/client.js" data-repo="aolehorizon/Blog_Comments" data-repo-id="R_kgDOOFPuRg" data-category="Announcements" data-category-id="DIC_kwDOOFPuRs4Cntoi" data-mapping="pathname" data-strict="0" data-reactions-enabled="1" data-emit-metadata="0" data-input-position="bottom" data-theme="preferred_color_scheme" data-lang="zh-CN" data-loading="lazy" crossorigin="anonymous" async></script>

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
